name: basicapi
description: A Basic API deployed as an AWS lambda

scripts.httpDebug: cross-env HTTPS_PROXY=http://127.0.0.1:8888 nodemon -e ts --exec "npm run build"
scripts.aws-dependencies: ts-node scripts/dependencySetup.ts && cd .build && npm install && cd ..
scripts.aws-deploy: npm run aws-build && npm run aws-dependencies && npm run aws-package && sls deploy

author: Gary Archer
